vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἐλιακείμ(Heb. אֶלְיָקִים),
Eliakim, an ancestor of Jesus: Mat.1:13, Luk.3:30.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, first mentioned at Mat.1.13;
son of: Abiud (G0010);
father of: Azor (G0107)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利亞敬 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "神所興起的"
1)亞比玉（或猶大）的長子 ,約瑟的兄弟,亞所的父親. 見#太 1:13|
2)米利亞的兒子, 約南的父親 見#路 3:30,31|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以利亚敬这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"神所兴起的"
1)亚比玉（或犹大）的长子,约瑟的兄弟,亚所的父亲. 见#太1:13|
2)米利亚的儿子, 约南的父亲见#路3:30,31|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.30;
son of: Melea (G3190);
father of: Jonam (G2494)
